Use the pinch gesture to zoom in and out.
To see the furniture table swipe with 1 finger from the left edge of the plan view.
To see the furniture catalog swipe from the right edge, you can add furniture from there.
To pan without altering the current selection swipe with 2 fingers together.
To select more than one object use the Select lasso or Select multiple actions in the More menu.
Two demo sh3d files will be in your downloads folder, select More->Open home.
Use your browser to download more sh3d files from the internet, they will open from the browser.

Please visit http://www.sweethome3d.com/gallery
and http://www.sweethome3d.com/
for more information.

Press the add furniture icon to place the selected furniture item onto the plan view at the location 0,0.
Alternatively you can long press on the item (there is no drag and drop).
From this view you can import furniture catalog libraries, select Menu->Import furniture library…
You can download furniture and texture libraries from the internet, you may need to unzip them using a file explorer before importing them.

Please visit http://www.sweethome3d.com/importModels
and http://www.sweethome3d.com/importTextures

This is a view of all the furniture currently placed on your plan.
For now the only function you can do here is to change an items visibility.

This is a 3 dimensional view of your plan.
From here you can use 1 or 2 fingers to move the view.
Please note in all cases the concept is "drag what I'm looking at around".
If you are looking from the top down:
One finger sliding left or right will rotate the plan.
One finger sliding up or down will alter the height of the camera and also the pitch.
Two fingers sliding up or down will move the camera closer to the center or further from it.
Two fingers sliding side to side will not do anything.
If you are looking from the visit point of view:
One finger sliding left or right will rotate the plan around you.
One finger sliding up or down will alter the vertical angle your head is pointed.
Two fingers sliding up or down will move the view towards or away from you.
Two fingers sliding side to side will move the view left or right.
Saved points of view can be found under the eye icon.
Changing from top down to visit can be done by the icon of a man or a plan.
If you see a corrupt view, please try the deoptomize option in the menu.
